3rd rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 18 sc.
4th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. Join. 24 sc.
5th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc. *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last 2 sc. 1 sc in each of last 2 sc. Join. 30 sc.
6th rnd: Ch 2 (does not count as hdc). (1 hdc in each of next 2 sc. 2 hdc in next sc) 3 times. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Sl st in each of next 2 sc. 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. *2 hdc in next sc. 1 hdc in each of next 2 sc. Rep from * to end of rnd. Join. 38 sts.
Fasten off.
Muzzle
With B, ch 6.
1st row: 1 hdc in 3rd ch from hook. 1 hdc in each of next 2 ch. 5 hdc in last ch. Working into opposite side of foundation ch, 1 hdc in each of next 3 ch. Fasten off.
Using straight st, embroider nose and mouth on Muzzle.
Cheek
With A, ch 3.
1st rnd: 10 hdc in 3rd ch from hook. Join.
Fasten off.
Sew Muzzle to Head as shown in photo. Sew Cheek on top of Muzzle as shown in photo.
Ears (make 2)
With B, ch 5.
1st row: (WS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each of next 2 ch. 3 sc in last ch. Working into opposite side of foundation ch, 1 sc in each of next 3 ch. Break B, join A. Turn. 9 sc.
2nd row: With A, ch 1. 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 hdc in next sc. (1 dc. 1 tr. 1 dc) all in next sc. 2 hdc in next sc. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. 13 sts.
Fasten off.
Sew one Ear to front of Head as shown in photo. Sew one Ear to back of Head as shown in photo.
Eye
With E, ch 2.
1st rnd: 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join. 6 sc.
Fasten off.
Sew Eye to Head as shown in photo. 
Using B, embroider spots on Head and whites of Eye as shown in photo.
Neck
With A, ch 9.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of chain. Turn. 8 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
Rep 2nd row twice more.
Fasten off.
Garland
With C, ch 12.
1st row: (RS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. *Ch 2. 1 sc in next ch. Rep from * to end of chain. 
Fasten off.
Sew Garland to Neck as shown in photo.
Sew Neck to Head as shown in photo.
Cut 5" [12.5 cm] length of D and tie into bow. Attach bow to Garland as shown in photo.
Hanging Loop
With A, ch 12.
Fasten off.
Sew Hanging Loop to top of Head as shown in photo.

materials: Red Heart® Granny Square All in One™ (8.8 oz/250 g; 417 yds/381 m) Soft White – Pink Punch (2001) 1 ball
Size U.S. I/9 (5.5 mm) Susan Bates® Silvalume® crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
Small amount of Brown worsted weight yarn for ‘stem’.
measurements: Approx 6" [15 cm] high, excluding ‘stem’.
instructions:
MOTIFS 
Notes for Red Heart® Granny Square All in One™ yarn:
• Motifs begin with Color 1 (shortest color rep) from center of pull-skein, leaving a 4" [10 cm] tail to weave in.
• Each color aligns with 1 round (rnd) in the Motif with 5 colors in total. If too much color is left at end of rnd, pull back some stitches (sts) and slightly loosen gauge to re-work sts and finish at color change. If too little color is left, pull back some sts and slightly tighten gauge to re-work sts and finish at color change.
• When Motif is complete, cut yarn where Color 5 (longest color rep) ends, leaving a tail for weaving in. Begin next Motif with Color 1 and repeat 5 rnds for each Motif.

CLASSIC GRANNY 
Notes:
• Ch 3 at beg of rnd counts as dc.
• Ch 6 at beg of rnds counts as dc and ch-3 sp.
• Join all rnds with sl st to 3rd ch of ch-6 unless otherwise indicated.
With Color 1, ch 4. Join with sl st to first ch to form ring.
1st rnd:  (RS). Ch 6. (3 dc. Ch 3) 3 times in ring. 2 dc in ring. Join.
2nd rnd:  Sl st in ch-3 sp. Ch 6. 3 dc in same ch-3 sp. *Ch 1. (3 dc. Ch 3. 3 dc) in next ch-3 sp. Rep from * twice more. Ch 1. 2 dc in first ch-3 sp. Join.
3rd rnd:  Sl st in ch-3 sp. Ch 6. 3 dc in same ch-3 sp. *Ch 1. 3 dc in next ch-1 sp. Ch 1. (3 dc. Ch 3. 3 dc) in next ch-3 sp. Rep from * twice more. Ch 1. 3 dc in last ch-1 sp. Ch 1. 2 dc in first ch-3 sp. Join. 
4th and 5th rnds: Sl st in ch-3 sp. Ch 6. 3 dc in same ch-3 sp. *(Ch 1. 3 dc) in each ch-1 sp to next ch-3 sp. Ch 1.** (3 dc. Ch 3. 3 dc) in next ch-3 sp. Rep from * twice more, then from * to ** once. 2 dc in first ch-3 sp. Join. Fasten off.

BLOCK GRANNY 
Notes:
• Ch 3 at beg of rnd counts as dc.
• Ch 6 at beg of rnds counts as dc and ch-3 sp.
With Color 1, ch 4. Join with sl st to first ch to form ring.
1st rnd:  (RS). Ch 6. (3 dc. Ch 3) 3 times in ring. 2 dc in ring. Join. Color 1 ends.
2nd rnd:  With Color 2, sl st in ch-3 sp. Ch 3. 1 dc in same ch-3 sp. *1 dc in each of next 3 dc. (2 dc. Ch 3. 2 dc) in next ch-3 sp. Rep from * twice more. 1 dc in each of last 3 dc. 2 dc in next ch-3 sp (same sp as beg ch-3). Join with hdc to beg ch-3. Color 2 ends.
3rd rnd: With Color 3, ch 3. (1 dc. Ch 3. 2 dc) all in sp created by joining hdc of 2nd rnd. *1 dc in each of next 7 dc. (2 dc. Ch 3. 2 dc) in next ch-3 sp. Rep from * twice more. 1 dc in each of last 7 dc. Join with sl st to beg ch-3. Sl st in next dc and next ch-3 sp. Color 3 ends.
4th rnd: With Color 4, ch 6. 1 dc in same ch-3 sp as last sl st. *1 dc in each of next 11 dc. (1 dc. Ch 3. 1 dc) in next ch-3 sp. Rep from * twice more. 1 dc in each of last 11 dc. Join with sl st to 3rd ch of ch 6. Color 4 ends.
5th rnd:  With Color 5, sl st in next ch-3 sp. [(Ch 3. 2 dc) twice] in same ch-3 sp. *Ch 1. Skip next 2 dc. 3 dc in next dc. (Ch 1. Skip next 3 dc. 3 dc in next dc) twice. Ch 1.** Skip next 2 dc. (3 dc. Ch 3. 3 dc) in next ch-3 sp. Rep from * twice more, then from * to **. Skip last 2 dc. Join with sl st to beg ch-3. Fasten off.

ASSEMBLY
Fold ends of Motif towards back as shown in photo. Using whipstitch, sew sides of lower ‘triangle’ together first, then join center back seam.
Stem: With RS facing, join Brown yarn with sl st at center sp of bottom edge. (Ch 4. 2 tr. Ch 4) all in same sp. Rejoin with sl st in same sp. Fasten off.
Hanging Loop:  Using color of choice, join yarn with sl st at ‘tip’. Ch 15. Rejoin with sl st in same sp. Fasten off.

materials: Worsted Gauge Yarn (as supplied in kit)
Size U.S. G/6 (4 mm) Susan Bates® Silvalume® crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge
abbreviations: Sc2tog = Draw up a loop in each of next 2 stitches. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook.
measurements: Approx 3" [7.5 cm] tall, excluding Hanging Loop.
gauge: 18 sc and 20 rows = 4" [10 cm]. Crochet a gauge swatch.
instructions:
Notes:
• Worked in continuous rnds, do not join at end of rnd.
• Move marker as work progresses to last st in each rnd. Working with Stitch Markers.
• The workings of a crochet stitch.
• To change colors, work to last 2 loops on hook of first color, yoh with new color and proceed.
• Carry color not in use along top of last row worked and work new sts around carried color.
Changing Colors.
SANTA
Head
See diagram on page 3.
With A, make magic loop.
1st rnd: Ch 1. 6 sc into loop. PM on last st. Pull magic loop tight.
2nd rnd: 2 sc in each sc around. 12 sc.
3rd rnd: *1 sc in next st. 2 sc in next st. Rep from * around. 18 sc.
4th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 24 sc.
5th rnd: 1 sc in each sc around. 
6th rnd: *1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc. Rep from * around. 30 sc.
7th rnd: 1 sc in each of next 8 sc. PM in last st worked for Beard placement. 1 sc in each sc around.
8th and 9th rnds: 1 sc in each of next 15 sc. Change to C. 1 sc in each of next 15 sc. Change to A.
10th rnd: (1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Sc2tog) 3 times. Change to C, (1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Sc2tog) 3 times. Change to A. 24 sc.
11th rnd: 1 sc in each of next 12 sc. Change to C. 1 sc in each of next 12 sc. Change to A.
12th rnd: (1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Sc2tog) 3 times. Break A, change to C, (1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Sc2tog) 3 times. Sl st in next st. Fasten off. 18 sc. Fasten off.
Stuff Head firmly.
Hat
See diagram on page 4.
Note: Join all rnds with sl st to first st, unless otherwise stated.
With C, make magic loop.
1st rnd: Ch 1. 6 sc into loop. Pull magic loop tight. Join.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join. Break C, join B.
3rd rnd: With B, ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
4th rnd: Ch 1. (1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc) 3 times. Join. 9 sc.
5th and 6th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
7th rnd: Ch 1. (1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc) 3 times. Join. 12 sc.
8th rnd: Ch 1. (1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc) 6 times. Join. 18 sc.
9th and 10th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
11th rnd: Ch 1. (1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 2 sc in next sc) 6 times. Join. 24 sc.
12th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
13th rnd: Ch 1. (1 sc in each of next 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc) 6 times. Join. 30 sc.
14th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join. Break B, join C.
15th and 16th rnds: With C, ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join. Fasten off at end of 16th rnd, leaving long tail.
Fold first 6 rnds of Hat down over sl st at end of 7th to 11th rnds. Sew in place using long tail. Do not break long tail. Stuff Hat lightly.
With rem long tail, sew 15th rnd of Hat to top of Head so 1st rnd of Hat points to the left, and Hat sits at slight angle, as shown.
Beard
Notes:
• Join all rnds with sl st to first st, unless otherwise stated.
• Ch 2 at beg of rnd/row does not count as hdc.
With C, ch 2.
1st rnd: (RS). 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join.
2nd row: Ch 2. 2 hdc in first sc. 3 dc in each of next 2 sc. 2 hdc in next sc. Turn. Leave rem sts unworked.
3rd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 2 hdc. 2 hdc in next dc. 1 dc in next dc. 2 dc in each of next 2 dc. 1 dc in next dc. 2 hdc in next dc. 1 sc in each of last 2 hdc. Turn.
4th row: Ch 6. Sl st in 2nd ch from hook and each of next 4 ch [Sideburn made]. (1 sc in each of next 2 sts. 2 sc in next st) 4 times. 1 sc in each of next 2 sts. Ch 6. Sl st in 2nd ch from hook and each of next 4 ch. Sl st in last sc worked. Fasten off.
Moustache
See diagram on page 4.
With RS facing, join C with sl st to first unworked sc of 1st rnd of Beard.
1st row: (RS). Ch 1. 3 sc in each of 2 unworked sc. Fasten off.
Fold Moustache down and sew to secure on RS of Beard. With C, sew top of Beard and Sideburns to Head, with Beard centered at marker in 7th rnd of Head, and ends of Sideburns under brim of Hat, as shown.
Face
With A, make a French Knot with 5 wraps around needle for nose centered above Beard, as shown. Split black yarn into 2 plies and embroider eyes with Straight Stitch.
Hanging Loop
Cut a strand of C 5" [12.5 cm] long. Fold strand in half and tie ends to form Hanging Loop. Pull Hanging Loop halfway through top of Santa Hat then pull loop through itself and tighten to secure.
Alternate: With C and yarn needle, pass yarn through top of Santa Hat and base of provided Keychain Clasp. Whipstitch and tie securely as close to top of Santa Hat as possible and weave in ends.

materials: Red Heart® Super Saver® (7 oz/198 g; 364 yds/333 m)
Contrast A Cherry Red (0319) 1 ball or 18 yds/16.5 m
Contrast B Soft White (0316) 1 ball or 18 yds/16.5 m
Contrast C Spring Green (0672) 1 ball or 7 yds/6.5 m
Contrast A Cherry Red (0319) 1 ball or 7 yds/6.5 m
Contrast B Soft White (0316) 1 ball or 18 yds/16.5 m
Contrast C Spring Green (0672) 1 ball or 18 yds/16.5 m
Contrast A Cherry Red (0319) 1 ball or 7 yds/6.5 m
Contrast C Spring Green (0672) 1 ball or 36.5 yds/33 m
Size U.S. H/8 (5.5 mm) Susan Bates® Silvalume® crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
measurements: Approx 4" [10 cm] diameter.
instructions:
COIL
Chain (Ch) 40, leaving a long tail, approximately (approx) 5" [12 cm] long.
1st row: 2 double crochet (dc) in 4th ch from hook (counts as 3 dc). 3 dc in each ch to end of chain. Fasten off leaving a long tail, approx 5" [12 cm] long.
BOW
Ch 50. Slip stitch (Sl st) in each ch to end of chain. Fasten off. Loop into bow and wrap yarn around center to secure.
FINISHING
Twist Coils around each other to form Wreath. Using tails, tie ends together (tog).
Sew Bow to Wreath at bottom center, between Coils.
Version 1
Make 1 Coil each in A and B.
Make Bow in C.
Version 2
Make 1 Coil each in B and C.
Make Bow in A.
Version 3
Make 2 Coils in C.
Make Bow in A.

materials: Worsted Gauge Yarn (as supplied in kit)
Size U.S. G/6 (4 mm) Susan Bates® Silvalume® crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
abbreviations: Picot = Ch 3. Sl st in 3rd ch from hook – picot made.
Sc2tog = Draw up a loop in each of next 2 stitches. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook.
measurements: Approx 3" [7.5 cm] tall, excluding Star and Hanging Loop.
gauge: 18 sc and 20 rows = 4" [10 cm]. Crochet a gauge swatch.
instructions:
Notes:
• Join all rnds with sl st to first st unless otherwise stated.
• Working with Stitch Markers .
• The workings of a crochet stitch.

TREE
With B, make a magic loop.
See diagrams on page 3.
1st rnd: Ch 1. 6 sc in loop. Pull magic loop tight and join.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join. 12 sc. How to do crochet increases.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. (1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc) 6 times. Join. 18 sc.
4th rnd: Ch 1. (1 sc in each of next 5 sc. 2 sc in next sc) 3 times. Join. Break B. 21 sc.
5th rnd: Join A with sl st to back loop of first sc. Ch 1. Working in back loops only, 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
6th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.

7th rnd: Working in front loops only, skip first sc. *(1 hdc. 1 dc. Ch 1. 1 dc. 1 hdc) all in next sc.** Skip next 2 sc. Rep from * 5 times more, then from * to ** once. Skip last sc. Join with sl st to back loop of first skipped sc of 6th rnd.
8th rnd: Working into rem loops of 6th rnd, ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join.
9th rnd: Ch 1. (1 sc in each of next 5 sc. Sc2tog) 3 times. Join. 18 sts.
10th rnd: Working in front loops only, skip first sc. *(1 hdc. 1 dc. Ch 1. 1 dc. 1 hdc) all in next sc.** Skip next 2 sc. Rep from * 4 times more. Skip next sc. Working into both loops, sl st in each of last 3 sc. Join with sl st to back loop of first skipped sc of 9th rnd.
11th rnd: Working into rem loops of 9th rnd and sl sts of 10th rnd, ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join.
12th rnd: Ch 1. (1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Sc2tog) 3 times. Join. 15 sts.
13th rnd: Working in front loops only, skip first sc. *(1 hdc. 1 dc. Ch 1. 1 dc. 1 hdc) all in next sc.** Skip next 2 sc. Rep from * 3 times more, then from * to ** once. Skip last sc. Join with sl st to back loop of first skipped sc of 12th rnd.
14th rnd: Working into rem loops of 12th rnd, ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join.
Stuff Tree lightly.
15th rnd: Ch 1. (1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Sc2tog) 3 times. Join. 12 sts.
16th rnd: Working in front loops only, skip first sc. *(1 hdc. 1 dc. Ch 1. 1 dc. 1 hdc) all in next sc.** Skip next 2 sc. Rep from * twice more, then from * to ** once. Skip last sc. Join with sl st to back loop of first skipped sc of 15th rnd.
17th rnd: Working into rem loops of 15th rnd, ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join.
18th rnd: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) 6 times. Join. 6 sts.
19th rnd: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) 3 times. Join. Ch 1. Working through both thicknesses of 19th rnd, sl st across opening to close. Fasten off.
Flip 7th, 10th, 13th, 16th rnds down so WS is facing out.

Right side vs Wrong side

Snow
Work into 7th, 13th, and 16th rnds of Tree:
1st rnd: (WS). Join B with sl st to any ch-1 sp. Ch 1. 2 sc in same ch-1 sp. *1 sc in next st. Sc2tog. 1 sc in next st. 3 sc in next ch-1 sp. Rep from * around to last 4 sts. 1 sc in next st. Sc2tog. 1 sc in next st. 1 sc in first ch-1 sp. Join. Fasten off.

Work into 10th rnd of Tree:
1st rnd: (WS). Join B with sl st to last hdc of 10th rnd. Ch 1. 1 sc in first hdc. *1 sc in next st. 3 sc in next ch-1 sp. 1 sc in next st. Sc2tog. Rep from * 3 times more. 1 sc in next st. 3 sc in next ch-1 sp. 1 sc in each of next 2 sts. Fasten off.

Hanging Loop
Cut a strand of A 5" [12.5 cm] long. Fold strand in half and tie ends to form Hanging Loop. Pull Hanging Loop halfway through top of Tree, pull Hanging Loop through itself and tighten to secure.
Alternate: With A and yarn needle, pass yarn through top of Tree and base of provided Keychain Clasp. Whipstitch and tie securely as close to top of Tree as possible and weave in ends.

Star
With C, ch 2.
1st rnd: (Sl st. Picot) 5 times in 2nd ch from hook. Join with sl st in same sp as last sl st and fasten off.
Sew Star to top of Tree at base of Hanging Loop on same side as space in 10th rnd.

Weave in all ends.
Face
Split black yarn into 2 plies and embroider face use French knot for eyes and Straight Stitch for mouth in space left in 10th rnd, as shown.

STRAIGHT STITCH
FRENCH KNOT

materials: Lily® Sugar’n Cream™ (2.5 oz/70.9 g; 120 yds/109 m) Contrast A Warm Brown (01130) 2 balls or 170 yds/155 m
Contrast B Soft Ecru (01004) 1 ball or 78 yds/71 m
Contrast C Dark Pine (00016) 1 ball or 28 yds/25.5 m
Contrast D Red (00095) 1 ball or 7 yds/6.5 m
Sizes U.S. D/4 (3.5 mm) and U.S. G/6 (4 mm) crochet hooks or size needed to obtain gauge.
measurements: Approx 3¾" [9.5 cm] diameter.
gauge: 14 sc and 15 rows = 4" [10 cm] with larger hook.
instructions:
Pudding (make 2)
With A and larger hook, ch 2. 
1st rnd: 6 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 
Join with sl st to first sc. 6 sc. 
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in same sp as 
last sl st. 2 sc in each sc around. 
Join with sl st to first sc. 12 sc. 
3rd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as 
last sl st. *2 sc in  next sc. 1 sc in 
next sc. Rep from * to last sc. 2 sc 
in last sc. Join with sl st to first sc. 
Turn. 18 sc. 
4th rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in same sp as 
last sl st. *1 sc in each of next 2 sc. 
2 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last 
2 sc. 1 sc in each of last 2 sc. Join 
with sl st to first sc. 24 sc.
5th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in same sp as 
last sl st. *2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in 
each of next 3 sc. Rep from * to 
last 3 sc. 2 sc in next sc. 1 sc in 
each of last 2 sc. Join with sl st to 
first sc. Turn. 30 sc.
6th rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in same sp as 
last sl st. *1 sc in each of next 4 sc. 
2 sc in next sc. Rep from * to last  
4 sc. 1 sc in each of last 4 sc. Join 
with sl st to first sc. 36 sc. Fasten off.
Icing
With B and larger hook, ch 5.
1st row: (WS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from 
hook. 1 sc in each of next 3 ch. 
Turn. 4 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc 
in each sc to last sc. 2 sc in last sc. 
Turn. 
Rep last row 3 times more. 12 sc.
Final row: (RS). Ch 2 (counts as 
hdc). 2 dc in first sc. Skip next  
2 sc. Sl st in next sc. Skip next sc. 
(2 dc in next sc) twice. Skip next 
sc. Sl st in next sc. Skip next 2 sc. 
(2 dc. 1 hdc) in last sc. Fasten off.
Leaf (make 2)
With C and smaller hook, ch 6.
1st rnd: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 
1 sc in each of next 2 ch. Ch 3. 
Sl st back into last sc worked – 
picot made. 1 sc in next ch. 3 sc 
in last ch (left tip). Working into 
opposite side of ch, 1 sc in each 
of next 2 ch. Picot. 1 sc in each of 
last 2 ch. Join with sl st to first sc. 
Fasten off, leaving a long end for 
sewing.
Cherry
With D and smaller hook, ch 2.
1st rnd: 5 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 
Join with sl st to first sc. Fasten 
off, leaving a long end for sewing.
FINISHING
Place WS of 2 Pudding pieces 
facing each other. Position Icing 
on top and pin pieces tog. Join A 
with sl st through all thicknesses 
at left corner of Icing. Ch 1. Work 
1 rnd of sc around outer edge to 
join all pieces. Join with sl st to 
first sc. Fasten off.
Sew Leaves and Cherry in position.
Hanging Loop: Cut 10" [25.5 cm] 
length of B. Fold in half and 
attach to top of Pudding. Knot tog 
leaving approx 1" [2.5 cm] ends.

materials: Simply Soft (170 g/6. oz;288 m/315 yds)
measurements: Approx. 4" / 10 cm across
gauge: Gauge is not critical for this project.
instructions:
STAR
Using A, chain 5; join with slip to form ring.
Round 1: Ch 1, work 10 sc in ring, join with slip to first sc—10 sc.
Round 2: * Ch 6, skip next sc, slip st in next sc; repeat from * 4 times, join with a slip st in base of beginning ch-6—five ch-6 spaces.
Round 3: Ch 1, work [3 sc, ch 5, 3 sc] in each ch-6 space, join with slip to first sc—five ch-5 corner spaces. Fasten off A; join B with a sc in any ch-5 corner space (counts as first sc).
Round 4: Work [2 sc ch 3, 3 sc] in same space as joining, * sc in next 2 sc, sc in center of ring (see photo), skip 2 sc, + sc in next 2 sc, work [3 sc, ch 3, 3 sc] in next corner space; repeat from * 4 times, end last repeat at +, sc in last two sc, join with a slip st to first sc. Fasten off.
Using yarn needle, weave in all ends.

materials: Red Heart® Super Saver™ (7 oz/198 g; 364 yds/333 m)
Size U.S. 7 [4.5 mm] crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
abbreviations: Sc2tog = Draw up a loop in each of next 2 stitches. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook.
measurements: Rainbow: Approx 4" [10 cm] high x 5" [12.5 cm] wide. Champagne Bottle: Approx 6" [15 cm] high x 2" [5 cm] diameter. Mushroom: Approx 4" [10 cm] high x 3" [7.5 cm] diameter.
instructions:
Notes: All rnds are joined with sl st to first sc. 
RAINBOW
With E, ch 4. Join with sl st to first ch to form ring.
1st rnd: Ch 1. 12 sc in ring. Join.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join. 24 sc. Break E. Join A.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next st. 2 sc in next st. Rep from * around. Join. 36 sc. Break A. Join D.
4th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sts. 2 sc in next st. Rep from * around. Join 48 sts. Break D. Join G.
5th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sts. 2 sc in next st. Rep from * around. Join 60 sts. 

Fold in half. Working through both thicknesses, work 1 row of sc in each of next 30 (paired) sts. Fasten off. 
Hanging Loop
Join G with sl st to center of Top of Rainbow. Ch 16. Join with sl st in same place as joining sl st. Fasten off and secure ends. 
Pompom Clouds (make 2).
Wind F around 3 fingers approx 50 times. Remove from fingers and tie tightly in center with length of yarn approx 5" [12.5 cm] long. Cut through each side of loops. Trim to a smooth round shape. Using long tail, tie one pompom to each end of Rainbow as shown in photo. 

CHAMPAGNE BOTTLE
Label
With D, ch 7.
1st row: (RS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of chain. Turn. 6 sc.
2nd and 3rd rows: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc across. Turn.
4th row: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) 3 times. 3 sc.
Edging rnd: (RS). Ch 1. Work 1 rnd of sl st evenly around perimeter of label. Join. Fasten off.
Bottle
With A, ch 2.
1st rnd: 10 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join. 20 sc.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next st. 2 sc in next st. Rep from * around. Join. 30 sc.
4th rnd: Ch 1. Working in back loops only, 1 sc in each st around. Join.
5th to 10th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
Note: Sew Label to Bottle as shown in photo before decreases. Stuff base of Bottle Lightly.
11th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 4 sts. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 25 sc.
12th and alt rnds: As 5th rnd.
13th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sts. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 20 sc.
15th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sts. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 15 sc.
17th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next st. Sc2tog. Rep from * around. Join. 10 sc.
18th to 24th rnds: As 5th rnd. Break A. Join H.
25th to 27th rnds: With H, as 5th rnd. 
Add additional stuffing as needed. Break yarn leaving a long end. Draw end tightly through rem sts and fasten securely.
Hanging Loop
Join H with sl st to center of Top of Champagne. Ch 16. Join with sl st in same place as joining sl st. Fasten off and secure ends.
MUSHROOM
Stem
With H, ch 2.
1st rnd: (RS). 10 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. Working in back loops only, 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
3rd to 10th rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join.
11th rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each st around. Join. 20 sc.
12th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in next st. 2 sc in next st. Rep from * around. Join. 30 sc.
13th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 2 sts. 2 sc in next st. Rep from * around. Join. 40 sc.
14th rnd: Ch 1. *1 sc in each of next 3 sts. 2 sc in next st. Rep from * around. Join. 50 sc.
Fasten off. Stuff Stem.
Cap
With G, ch 2.
1st rnd: (RS). 10 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Join.
2nd and alt rnds: Ch 1. 1 sc in each st around. Join.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each st around. Join. 20 sc.

materials: Worsted Gauge Yarn (as supplied in kit)
Size U.S. G/6 (4 mm) Susan Bates® Silvalume® crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
abbreviations: Sc2tog = Draw up a loop in each of next 2 stitches. Yoh and draw through all loops on hook.
measurements: Approx 3" [7.5 cm] tall, excluding Hanging Loop.
gauge: 18 sc and 20 rows = 4" [10 cm]. Crochet a gauge swatch.
instructions:
Notes:
• Join all rnds with sl st to first st, unless otherwise stated.
• When working with more than 1 color in a row and joining new color, work to last 2 loops on hook of last st. Draw new color through 2 loops, then proceed in new color. Changing Colors
• Carry color not in use across top of previous row, unless otherwise stated, and work sts around it to prevent stranding.
• Working with Stitch Markers.
• The workings of a crochet stitch.

PENGUIN
Body
See diagram on page 3.
With A, make magic loop.
1st rnd: (RS). 8 sc in loop. Pull magic loop tight and join.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 2 sc in each sc around. Join. 16 sc. How to do crochet increases.
3rd rnd: Ch 1. (1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in next sc) 8 times. Join. 24 sc.

4th rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 12 sc. Change to B, 1 sc in each of next 12 sc. Join.
5th rnd: With B, 1 sc in first sc. Change to A, 1 sc in each of next 10 sc. Change to B, 1 sc in each of next 13 sc. Join.
6th to 9th rnds: With B, ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 2 sc. Change to A, 1 sc in each of next 8 sc. Change to B, 1 sc in each of next 14 sc. Join.
10th rnd: With B, ch 1. 1 sc in first sc. Change to A, 1 sc in each of next 10 sc. Change to B, 1 sc in each of next 13 sc. Join.
11th rnd: With B, ch 1. 1 sc in first sc. Change to A, 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Change to B, 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Change to A, 1 sc in each of next 4 sc. Change to B, 1 sc in each of last 13 sc. Join.
12th rnd: With B, ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 2 sc. Change to A, 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Change to B, 1 sc in each of next 2 sc. Change to A, 1 sc in each of next 3 sc. Break A, change to B, 1 sc in each of last 14 sc. Join.
13th rnd: With B, ch 1. (1 sc in next sc. Sc2tog) around. Join. 16 sts.
Stuff Penguin lightly.
14th rnd: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) around. Join. 8 sc.
15th rnd: Ch 1. (Sc2tog) around. Join. 4 sc. Fasten off, leaving long tail. Using long tail, weave through tops of sts in last rnd and pull tight to close.
Fasten off.

Wings (make 2 alike)
See diagram on page 3.
With B, make magic loop.
1st rnd: (RS). Ch 1. 6 sc in loop. Pull magic loop tight and do not join.
2nd row: 2 sc in each of first 2 sc. 1 sc in next sc. Turn leaving rem sts unworked.
3rd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each of first 2 sc. Sl st in next sc. Fasten off.

Beak
See diagram on page 3.
With C, ch 3.
1st rnd: (RS). 2 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 3 sc in next ch. Working into opposite side of foundation chain, 1 sc in first ch worked. Join. 6 sc.
2nd rnd: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc around. Join.
Fasten off, leaving long tail for sewing.
Sew Beak to front of Body centered under 2 sc in B of 11th rnd.

Feet (make 2 alike)
See diagram on page 3.
With C, and leaving a long tail, ch 2.
1st row: (RS). 3 sc in 2nd ch from hook. Turn.
2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc across. Turn.
3rd row: Ch 1. 2 sc in first sc. 1 sc in next sc. 2 sc in last sc. Fasten off. 5 sc.

Assembly
With B and yarn needle, working only through unworked sts of 1st rnd, sew Wings to either side of A section of Body in 8th rnd, so 1st rnd of Wing is at top, and final sl st in 3rd row is to front of Body - noting 1 Wing will be RS out and other will be WS out.
With long tails of Feet, sew Feet, RS up, to bottom front of Body, as shown.

Hanging Loop
Cut a strand of B 5" [12.5 cm] long. Fold strand in half and tie ends to form Hanging Loop. Pull Hanging Loop halfway through top of Penguin then pull Loop through itself and tighten to secure.
Alternate: With B and yarn needle, pass yarn through top of Penguin and base of provided Keychain Clasp. Whipstitch and tie securely as close to top of Penguin as possible and weave in ends.

Eyes
Split black yarn into 2 plies and embroider eyes using French Knots, on either side of Beak, in 11th rnd of Body, as shown.

materials: Caron® Simply Soft™ (6 oz/170.1 g; 315 yds/288 m)
Size U.S. H/8 (5 mm) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
measurements: Approx 5½” [14 cm] long.
instructions:
Coil (make 1 each in A and B)
Ch 40. 2 dc in 4th ch from hook. 3 dc in each ch to end of chain. Fasten off.
Twist Coils around each other to form Candy Cane. Bend slightly approx 2½” [6 cm] 
from top. Using A, tack loosely to form curve. With A, make hanging loop.
